n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/credentials/okta begin -- Manifest -- CREDENTIAL: Okta -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2021.10.15' ,p_release=>'21.2.0' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9006773697014439 ,p_default_application_id=>100 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'WKSADMIN' ); wwv_flow_api.create_credential( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(22425201463512403) ,p_name=>'Okta' ,p_static_id=>'Okta' ,p_authentication_type=>'OAUTH2_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS' ,p_prompt_on_install=>true ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
